title: Exercise: React to Schema Drift with the SchemaScanner

questions.question: What is the purpose of the AttributeCreator transformer in this exercise?
options: To compare the original and updated schemas.
To create a message for each attribute added to the original schema.
To create an HTML report for failed schemas.

questions.question: How does the SchemaScanner method help users adapt to schema drift?
options: You can use it to build workspaces that will not allow schema drift to occur in the first place.
You can use it to invalidate data submissions and alert end-users that they are causing schema drift.

You can use it to compare schemas, and then use other transformers to generate a report that highlights the differences in the schema, which can be used to update the schema or modify the data accordingly.
You can use it to compare schemas, and then use other transformers to create a detailed visualization of the schema changes that can be used to troubleshoot errors.
